meanings.definition: More important than anything else; supreme.
meanings.sent1: Her safety was paramountly important to her parents.
meanings.sent2: The safety of the children is paramountly crucial.
meanings.sent3: The cat's comfort was paramountly considered when choosing a new bed.
meanings.sent4: The sun's rays shone paramountly bright in the clear sky.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's guidance was paramountly valuable to the students.

meanings.sent1: She paramountly focused on her studies to achieve good grades.
meanings.sent2: He paramountly trained for the marathon to improve his time.
meanings.sent3: The chef paramountly seasoned the dish with just the right amount of spices.
meanings.sent4: The singer's voice paramountly soared above the rest in the choir.
meanings.sent5: The athlete paramountly pushed himself to reach the finish line first.
